name: Big Donut (Skinner Space)
description:
You are a donut seller and your goal is to feed people with donuts until they get the right size to kill them and get money. Try to earn as much as you can while the police chasing you! You can just drop a Big Donut on the roof of a police car to crash it!

CONTROLS

Move - WASD or arrows

Throw donuts - E

Drop Big Donut - space

Made especially for the GDL - July 2021 Jam
